ygData.subject: Re: Hope this isn't too OT..but
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah EQ doesn t support the NVIDIA chip sets like 3DFX . . . I was sadly dissapointed when my brand spanking new GeForce256 looked worse than my VOODOO2 I
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah EQ doesn't support the NVIDIA chip sets like 3DFX . . .

I was sadly dissapointed when my brand spanking new GeForce256 looked worse than my VOODOO2

I emailed support@... and I will let you know what turns up.

now outside of EQ the cards rocks! I mean I did this 3D benchmark and it was about 3 times faster than my VOODOO2 .. . really smokin'

I changed my CPU speeds and FSB too and there was a noteable increase in performance of the video card when the CPU overall Mhz and FSB was increased so if you have a newer system I'd get one. I think EQ will support it soon. </e crosses his fingers>


----- Original Message -----
From: Trizzen Do'Trevan
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Thursday, February 24, 2000 10:25 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Hope this isn't too OT..but


From: Trizzen Do'Trevan <trizzen@...>

really? From the previous threads, I was going to go
online and buy one since I still use a banshee
card....now this is making me do a double take.

Anymore input? Please?!?!
